field.name: summary
field.value: Can't proxy remoting transparent interface proxies

field.name: description
field.value: When trying to proxy remoting transparent proxy for an interface type we get an exception that target does not implement the interface. This can be fixed quite easily for interface proxies with target interface. Interface proxies with target rely on target type so adding support there won't be that easy, and I don't think it's important anyway.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: I added project illustrating the issue.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''2.2''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
